item.title: About
item.description:
I am an open source software developer who love solving problems and everything open source. I am interested in everything STEAM(Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, & Mathematics).

I studied Electrical/Electronic Engineering Technology from Delta State Polytechnic, Ozoro, Nigeria(now known as Delta State University of Science and Technology). I am pursing a Computer Science degree from University of the People(UoPeople) which is a US distance learning school as part-time study along with MIT OpenCourseWare resources.
